document.full_text: steve stricker won the memorial tournament largely because of the way he feasted on the front nine but, for tournament host jack nicklaus, his best shot led to a par save on the back nine in the final round.
document.title: nicklaus applauds memorial champion stricker's bunker shot
lines_and_colors: steve stricker won the memorial tournament largely because of the way he feasted on the front nine but, for tournament host jack nicklaus, his best shot led to a par save on the back nine in the final round.
